About Me

BIO

I am a front-end web developer who focuses on writing clean, elegant, efficient code. I have a passion for designing functional and lovely experiences that will keep your customers coming back for more! I am proficient in HTML5, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript with object oriented programming, ES6, jQuery, build tools and task runners - Node.js, Gulp for automation and optimization. Writing test suites for projects using Jasmine testing framework. Code Linting for syntax and styling errors using ESLint.
